src:
【靚時尚】夢解析　Day Dreaming
07 Nov 2019, 22:30 by 李詩文, 嚴鎮坤, 陳廷豐, 李政達
那些開心的、愚蠢的、破碎的、夢幻的，
都是自己的一小部分，
拼湊出一場只屬於妳自己的白日夢。



成真美夢
將不同深淺、亮度的桃紅色互相搭配，加上可愛的徽章，再點綴鮮黃色的小雛菊耳環，就像一場充滿歡樂的美夢。
　
至人無夢


紅色運動外套 NT$11,800、紅色運動長褲 NT$9,580 All by PORTS V

別再覺得運動服是魚乾女的專屬，這一季成套運動服強勢回歸，搭配球鞋或是穆勒鞋，就是今年秋冬最時髦的造型。
　
重溫舊夢


象牙色針織圓領長袖洋裝 NT$175,000 by GUCCI

老奶奶造型針織衫，選米白色最復古，彷彿誤入一場白日夢派對的小女孩，在窗簾後逆著光，偷看自己長大的模樣。
　
初醒久夢


深藍色滾紅邊長版襯衫 NT$41,000；深藍色滾紅邊長褲 NT$23,000；Wings粉紅色皮帽 NT$44,000 All by LOEWE

飄逸寬鬆的絲質套裝，搭配高段班的朋友可以搭成套，展現出隨興的感覺。或是各自分開搭配牛仔褲或是簡單的T-shirt，也都是很吸睛的單品。
　
哆啦A夢


粉色花朵裝飾透膚洋裝 NT$67,500 by MiuMiu；螢光黃色高領針織衫 NT$8,120 by Maje；黑色內搭褲 NT$2,300 by MiuMiu；黑色花朵裝飾長襪 價格店洽 by MiuMiu；粉色皮革小雛菊耳環 NT$12,500 by PRADA

透視在今年秋冬也是一大重點，大膽地穿一件亮色系的內搭，粉嫩夢幻的色系與造型，就像是充滿泡泡的一場美夢。

模特兒：San　化妝：楊硯婷　髮型：Jun@HAIRMOSA LAB

更新時間｜2019.11.05 08:45
text:
[靓 Fashion] Dream Analysis Day Dreaming
07 Nov 2019, 22:30 by Li Shiwen, Yan Zhenkun, Chen Tingfeng, Li Zhengda
Those happy, stupid, broken, dreamy,
It’s all a small part of itself.
Put together a daydream that belongs only to you.



True dreams
Matching shades of different shades of pink, plus cute badges, and embellished with bright yellow daisy earrings, is like a happy dream.

No dreams


Red sports jacket NT$11,800, red sports trousers NT$9,580 All by PORTS V

Don't think that sportswear is exclusive to dried women. This season's complete set of sportswear is back, with sneakers or Muller shoes, it is the most fashionable shape this autumn and winter.

Relive old dreams


Ivory Knit Round Neck Long Sleeve Dress NT$175,000 by GUCCI

The grandmother's knit sweater is the most retro-styled white, as if it was a little girl who was mistaken into a daydream party. After the curtains, she turned against the light and peeked at how she grew up.

Awaken for a long time


Dark blue red long side shirt NT$41,000; dark blue red side trousers NT$23,000; Wings pink leather hat NT$44,000 All by LOEWE

The elegant and loose silk suit, with the friends of the high class, can be set up to show the feeling of happiness. Or separate jeans or a simple T-shirt, they are also eye-catching items.

Doraemon


Pink flower dress translucent dress NT$67,500 by MiuMiu; fluorescent yellow turtleneck sweater NT$8,120 by Maje; black inner leggings NT$2,300 by MiuMiu; black flower decorative stockings price shop by MiuMiu; pink leather small daisies earrings NT$12,500 By PRADA

Perspective is also a major focus in this autumn and winter. Boldly wearing a bright color interior, pink and dreamy colors and shapes, it is like a dream full of bubbles.

Model: San Makeup: Yang Yuting Hairstyle: Jun@HAIRMOSA LAB

Update time|2019.11.05 08:45
